metadata.title: USN-2461-2 -- libyaml-libyaml-perl vulnerability
metadata.description: Stanis≈Çaw Pitucha and Jonathan Gray discovered that libyaml-libyaml-perl did not properly handle wrapped strings. An attacker could create specially crafted YAML data to trigger an assert, causing a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2461-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libyaml-libyaml-perl - 0.41-5ubuntu0.14.04.1 No subscription required
